category: news
title: "Illegal trade in AI child sex abuse images exposed"
excerpt: "Paedophiles are using artificial intelligence (AI) technology to create and sell life-like child sexual abuse material, the BBC has found. Some are accessing the images by paying subscriptions to accounts on mainstream content-sharing sites such as Patreon. Patreon said it had a \"zero tolerance\" policy about such imagery on its site."
